name: American Water Works Company, Inc.
description: American Water Works Company, Inc. is the largest publicly traded water and wastewater utility company in the United States. Founded in 1886, the company provides drinking water, wastewater, and other utility services to approximately 15 million people across 24 states and Canada. American Water is dedicated to delivering high-quality water and wastewater services to its customers while striving to protect the environment and uphold the highest safety standards. The company's operations include the ownership and operation of water treatment and distribution systems, as well as wastewater collection and treatment facilities. American Water also invests in sustainable practices and technologies, working towards improving water efficiency and reducing its carbon footprint. The company plays a vital role in ensuring that communities have access to safe and reliable water, and it actively engages in projects that enhance infrastructure resilience and promote water conservation. With a strong commitment to corporate responsibility, American Water also focuses on community engagement and workforce development, ensuring that it meets the needs of the communities it serves. The company's mission is to enhance the quality of life in the communities it serves by providing safe, clean, and reliable water services while fostering a culture of sustainability and innovation.
